description: The policy to be attached to a Multi Region Access Point

MrapName.description: The name of the Multi Region Access Point to apply policy
MrapName.markdownDescription:
The name of the Multi Region Access Point to apply policy

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 3  
Maximum Length: 50  
Pattern: ^[a-z0-9][-a-z0-9]{1,48}[a-z0-9]$  
Update requires: Replacement

Policy.description: Policy document to apply to a Multi Region Access Point
Policy.markdownDescription:
Policy document to apply to a Multi Region Access Point

---

Required: Yes  
Update requires: No interruption

PolicyStatus.description: The Policy Status associated with this Multi Region Access Point

IsPublic.description: Specifies whether the policy is public or not.
IsPublic.markdownDescription:
Specifies whether the policy is public or not.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: true | false  
Update requires: No interruption

PolicyStatus.markdownDescription:
The Policy Status associated with this Multi Region Access Point

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption
